You play as Gordon.
Power armor are for pussies.

You are a man terrified beyond all rational thought, pushed so far from sanity that you are left speechless as the entire world around you collapses and starves from civil decay in this 1984-esque setting. The government wants you dead or alive (though preferably dead) and will stop at absolutely nothing to reach that goal. Little do you know at first, your actions have sparked a society of rebels to emerge from the ashes. It's uncertain what kind of outcome you'll find yourself with, regardless if you win or lose. All you know is that you're armed with a crowbar and need to get the hell off of this insane planet.

Oh, good old Half-Life series. While gamers are still waiting for Half-Life 3, they can just complete the second part over and over again, and every time they do that, they'll discover something new. Half-Life 2 is a game full of secrets, surprises, and great level design features. I wouldn't say it's [i]better[/i] than Half-Life 1 but that's only because they are so different that they can't actually be compared.

So, what does this game have to offer? For me, it is the following:

[b]1. A great storyline.[/b]
Not that Half-Life 1, the origin of the series, had a worse one, no. But now Half-Life 2 has a lot more dialogues than the first game, and they are a lot more detailed. The story is no longer a "human vs. alien" cliché, Valve turned it into a very original, very clever "human AND aliens vs. mutated humans controlled by a man controlled by a mysterious thing previously controlled by Nihilanth". Sounds good.

[b]2. Great graphics.[/b]
I have no desire to know what Call of Duty fans would say about the graphics in Half-Life 2. For me, they will always stay as awesome as I thought when I first saw them. Seriously, look at this game. It came from 2004 (11 years ago). Now, check other games from 2004 and look at them. Half-Life 2 is the obvious winner. In 2015, it still looks pretty. At least, for me.

[b]3. Physics.[/b]
Physics! Boxes breaking into really small parts! Carry boxes with yourself! What else could you dream of in 2004? In Half-Life 2, physics are just awesome, without exaggeration.

[b]4. Alyx.[/b]
A woman companion. I wouldn't say she looks as nice yet having a woman accompanying you is a great feature. Especially if she can shoot at enemies and even kill them sometimes. What else do you need?

[b]5. Puzzles.[/b]
The campaign of Half-Life 2 is not linear. That's what makes it beautiful: lots of puzzling elements (I keep getting stuck at some levels if I don't play this game, say, for a month or two). Totally not like Call of Duty, the best shooting range game of all times. In this game, you don't simply go from point A to point B, you discover secrets, solve puzzles, [spoiler]escape from a hunter chopper,[/spoiler] and only meanwhile, fight enemies.

These are only 5 features I'd most like to point out. There are always much more but to discover them, you have to play the game yourself. I totally recommend this game, it deserves ten stars out of five but I can't rate it this way, unfortunately. But keep in mind that you still have to play Half-Life 1 to get into the story.

I wrote a review for the original Half Life, and now came to do one for part 2. I never played either of them when they originally came out, and basically only rediscovered them after joining Steam. Half Life is amazing, but Half Life 2 is a life event. If you are an FPS fan then this is a must play, as I have learned. But if you are a fan of any game that uses your intelligence, tests reflexes and literally makes you smile at the end of a firefight, then this is a must have game. Simple as that.
I live in the year 3333 and I can confirm that Half-Life 3 is still not out yet.

即便距离HL2初次发布已经时隔将近11年，但经典的魅力犹如半臂维纳斯雕像一样依然不减。作为CS的开山鼻祖的续作，HL2那让两代人熟悉的画面风格使我无限怀旧；重力枪和撬棍的配合使得操作性与可玩性较之前作甚至让以往所有FPS单机游戏都黯然失色。剧情的丰富与巧妙地嵌合，使得我深陷其中不能自拔；诸如章节之一的 “我们不去莱温霍姆” 几乎可以和当时恐怖游戏剧情的巅峰《生化危机》系列一较高下。物品模型和物理效果仿真的精细程度绝对是当时最顶尖的，没有之一；当年的大卖特卖就是最好的证据.

  值此《Half-Life2》面市11年之际，入手HL2大包重温曾经的回忆；纪念我逝去的校园时光与第一次体验本作时还在的人。 经典不朽，青春不灭。
Uno de los mejores que eh jugado 10/10

Magnificent, creative and one of the best games ever made. Half-life 2 put the standard to what other games only can aspire to be. With beautiful graphics (however a bit dated to today standarts..), brilliant level design, an amazing history, memorable characters, great sound quality, facial animation and voice acting, a fun gameplay and the brilliant use of physic, HL2 is indeed a masterpiece. The atmosphere of this game and the immersion that she provides should be enough to convince you to buy this game.

 Yes, HL2 it's not perfect. The driving sections are a little too long and the IA of your allies is far from great (the enemy IA is good), but this pales in comparison with this game's successes. This a true game, one that everyone should play.

I also need to say that part of what make this game so great is the immersion that he provide. No cutscenes every 5 minutes, no little indicators telling what to do, only you and your brain. This is a true game, not the interactives movies for 5 year kids that we are used to play.

If you never played this game, please buy the Half-life Complete pack and welcome...

Ну, пройдя эту игру ничтожные 30 раз, я с уверенностью могу сложить только негативное мнение. Давайте по порядку:

Минусы:
- Игра платная
- Нет лутбоксов
- Графика ну такое себе
- Сюжет заставляет задуматься о сложностях и ничтожности человеческого бытия, а это сложно для такого придурка как я
- Почему нет режима батлрояля? Неужели нельзя было его сделать за 15 лет существования игры?
- В сюжете есть момент с тюремными локациями, что я считаю неприемлимым и осуждаю как пропаганду АУЕ движения
- Игра приветствует вольнодумие, протесты и сопротивление сильному государству, которое буквально списано с России, а так как я живу в этой самой России, то не могу позволить такого оскорбления нашего президента
- Пропагандирует насилие по отношению к органам правопорядка, нанесение ущерба частой и муниципальной собственности, экстремизм
- Абсолютно нереалистичная игра. Главный герой, который постоянно молчит, что невозможно в его условиях, способен выдержать очередь из крупнокалиберных винтовок, ружей, взрыв гранаты, прямое столкновение с кибернезированным солдатом Альянса, чьих физических сил хватает что бы в одиночку поднять авто

Плюсы:
+ Хотя бы не для VR, и в отличии от HL: Alyx я смогу поиграть в нее в любое время

Итог: 1000000/10

Having finished the game I’m updating this review but my opinion hasn’t changed. Tedious, tedious, and tedious.  I have to laugh when I read reviews about how this game doesn't hold your hand like most games.  Huh?  This is one of the most heavily scripted and linear games I've ever played.  Whether it’s through tunnels, rooms or driving down the road there's only one way to go.  It’s not open world and there's no exploring so you can't get lost, you keep going in the same direction.  Walls, buildings or something blocking your path always keeps you linearly going forward so why would you need hand holding?

As for the puzzles, there’s nothing consistent about them.  The point of puzzles or puzzling out the next step is that there has to be consistency so what you learn from the previous one can help provide a method or direction for the next one.  That doesn’t happen in this heavily scripted game.  If the script calls for you to place two boxes on top of each other to climb over something then that's the only thing you could do.  If the script doesn’t want you climbing over two boxes then you can’t, even if the scenarios is very similar to a previous one.  Meaning that the script has a different solution you have to ignore what worked before.

It’s the same with actions like jumping; if the script required you to jump 5ft from one obstacle to another obstacle to get the next point then you did it.  Try that with the next encounter and you can’t even jump 2ft because the script doesn’t want you to go in that direction.  So now you have to figure out what the lame scripted puzzle is for that scenario.  I don’t call inconsistencies in how you puzzle out the next step challenging, rather more like lazy programing.  

I played Half-Life 2 and both Episodes and this inconsistency was prevalent in all of them.  In one scenario I piled a couple of boxes on top of each other to jump over a fence.  I could see that the fence ended next to small building and was clearly about a foot taller that the building.  Makes sense to move the boxes next to the building and jump on the roof, right?  Placed the boxes next to the building and jump on them and what do you know, now the building is taller than the fence.  Jumped off the boxes and stepped back and clearly the fence is taller than the building.  Jump back on the boxes and the building again is taller than the fence.  Which basically means that the script doesn’t want me to go that way.  I wasted a lot of time in this game puzzling out the next step with inconstancies like that.  Lazy, lazy programing.

Of all the games I've played this one was definitely the most tedious.  It was stretched out waaayyy too long.  Nothing but heavily scripted scenarios of endless linear hallways, tunnels, roads, waterways while gunning your way running through gauntlets of bullet sponge enemies for no particular reason.  

In conclusion I can clearly see why there is no Half-Life 3.  Half-Life definitely belongs in the past when gamers weren’t so particular.

If you haven't already heard about how amazing this game is yet, than you shouldn't be on Steam. It is a direct sequel to Half-Life, which is already a good game. HL2 does everything that HL does, and more, with the introduction of the Gravity Gun, Vehicles, and extremely unique enemies. I had a lot of fun playing through it, and I am still going through to get all of the achievements! ;)

me encantó, es muy largo y los demas niveles de dificultad y logros dan mucha rejugabilidad. tiene graficos aceptables ya que valve lo actualiza cada tanto. la jugabilidad es la misma que en half life 1 aunque la adicion de la pistola gravitatiroia da mas interaccion con los escenarios y ayuda a resolver puzzles. un detalle que note es que hay menos enemigos que el el primer juego porque solo estan los soldados, las hormigas, los zancudos, headcrabs(de tres tipos), zombis (de tres tipos) aviones y helicopteros, pero no todos en el mismo lugar. los personajes tiene mucha personalidad y carisma como alyx o barney. la historia es buena y se ven lad consecuencias de nuestras acciones en el anterior juego. ademas todo se vuelve sombria y desesperanzadora la vida de los humanos si se lo ve bien. lo recomiendo altamente, ademas esta a un muy bajo precio teniendo en cuenta lo que ofrece

Half-Life 2- это, когда вам Барни говорит, что он должен вам банку пива.
Half-Life 2- это, когда Алекс спасает вас от комбайнов в самом начале.
Half-Life 2- это, когда Ламар всё портит. 
Half-Life 2- это, когда вам приходиться идти на своих двоих до другой базы Сопротивления
Half-Life 2- это, когда пастух отец Григорий следит за своим стадом.
Half-Life 2- это, когда вы можете побаловаться энергопушкой нулевого уровня с Псом.
Half-Life 2- это, когда ты становишься повелителем муравьиных львов.
Half-Life 2- это, когда два штурмовика заставляют тебя попотеть.
Half-Life 2- это, когда ты можешь манипулировать органичесой материей.
Half-Life 2- это, когда пропало защитное поле над городом, и настало время размножаться, но сначала надо закончить революцию.

V社出品，绝对经典！
小的时候因为不知道STEAM，一直都是在游民星空上面下载的盗版来玩的。现在虽然已经通关了一次，但是还是买了正版支持原作。玩了第一次通关差不多花了我一个暑假的时间，但是那些剧情还是深深的震撼了我的心，每天晚上夜深人静的时候便又想起了G-MAN那张冷峻的面庞和惊心动魄的剧情，让人久久不能入眠。剧情扣人心弦，节奏分明。不过剧情前半部分显得有些冗长，运河航道和17号高速公路，这几段章节玩家更加注重和NPC的互动与驾驶技术上面，至于要去哪里，剧情是什么，第一次玩的时候很容易忘记。常常需要仔细的回忆才能想起。有些解谜要素需要很动脑子，而且地图的设计上显得比较乱，没有任何标志性的指引，而且很多路都是死路，迷路也就是成了家常便饭。后半部分更加注重战斗射击要素，但是剧情解谜等有趣的要素又过于少了，降低了游戏的趣味性。而且后面的剧情收尾明显过于迅速，在此考虑到可能后半部分制作的时候V社也有些赶工，可能没怎么注意。最后GMAN的结尾真正给人留下很多悬念，（虽然后面还有Episode One等，但是我不想承认Episode One是HALF LIFE2的正统续作，Episode One与Episode Two在剧情处理上留下了一个烂摊子……这让后来的HL3出场无法延续之前的剧情，除非出Episode Three）也期待V社的新作。我相信一款好的游戏是经得起时间的考验的，当然这个制作过程需要一段时间的酝酿，所以也期待着吧！
还有一些问题就是玩HALF-LIFE2的时间久了经常会让人感觉的头晕，眼睛定不住东西。这个问题我玩CSGO的时候都没有遇到过，可能是因为游戏画面太真实的缘故吧，虽然是04年的游戏了，但是画质远比当时的游戏高出几等，现在看起来仍不过时。还有HALF-LIFE2 UPDATE这个补丁，非常适合二周目的重温，大家可以玩玩试试。
好了就说这些，这是一款毫无疑问的经典之作，V社是用了很多心思在上面的，是值得收藏的一款巅峰之作。我相信这款游戏是后面的其他作品都达不到的一款经典！
